about_the_game:
Adds six all new dice colors and designs to roll for those hard-to-roll numbers!

This DLC adds the following dice designs to your Dice-Zee! game instantly:

- Scratched Orchid
- Twilight Tanzanite
- Radiant Ruby
- Exquisite Emerald
- Pure Passion
- Molten Magma

If you don't own the dice sets in this DLC package, you can still earn them by grinding DZ coins inside the Dice-Zee! game and purchasing each dice set separately. The DZ coins are only earned by successfully completing the "DZ Event Challenges" that come up randomly while playing both the regular Dice-Zee game and the Quad Dice-Zee game.
detailed_description:
Adds six all new dice colors and designs to roll for those hard-to-roll numbers!

This DLC adds the following dice designs to your Dice-Zee! game instantly:

- Scratched Orchid
- Twilight Tanzanite
- Radiant Ruby
- Exquisite Emerald
- Pure Passion
- Molten Magma

If you don't own the dice sets in this DLC package, you can still earn them by grinding DZ coins inside the Dice-Zee! game and purchasing each dice set separately. The DZ coins are only earned by successfully completing the "DZ Event Challenges" that come up randomly while playing both the regular Dice-Zee game and the Quad Dice-Zee game.
name: Dice-Zee! - Dice Pak: "Serene Chromas"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIndows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 610 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
